newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Singapore weekly mid-dist stocks extends record.
newsitem.headline: Singapore weekly mid-dist stocks extends record.

text.p: Singapore's weekly distillates stocks rose by 339,000 barrels to 11.575 million barrels for the week ended June 18, Singapore's Trade Development board statistics showed on Thursday.
This extends the three-year record of 11.236 million barrels registered for the week ended June 11.
Middle distillates comprises jet, kerosene and gas oil.
Residues stocks rose by 960,000 barrels to 11.708 million barrels.
Residues comprise HSFO, LSFO, LSWR and the straight-run atmospheric residue, but exclude bitumen.
Light distillates stocks were down by 270,000 barrels to 6.105 million barrels.
Light distillate comprise gasoline, reformate and naphtha.
